source_objects.title: Home Improvement & Gardening
source_objects.description: Discover new how-to projects and learn advice from other do-it-yourselfers to fix up your home.

items.title: Irrigation 101: Piping Systems
items.headline: Learn all about using and repairing PVC, Polyethylene, Copper, Pex, and Galvanized Steel.
objectives_summary: Install and repair the pipe and tubing systems used for irrigation.

items.title: Growing Tomato Heaven: Garden grown tomatoes made easy!
items.headline: Learn to grow the best crop of garden tomatoes on the block
objectives_summary: Grow bushels of tasty home grown tomatoes, just feet from your own back door.
Learn tricks that will help you get your tomatoes planted 6 weeks earlier than normal.
Choose the right material to help extend your tomato harvest late into the fall

items.title: How to Make Up a 3 Phase Panel
items.headline: A Course from Electrician Basics
objectives_summary: After taking this course you will understand the basics of How to Make Up a 3 Phase Panel.

items.title: Home Automation For Beginners: Create Your Own Smart Home

visible_instructors.title: Gerard ODriscoll
visible_instructors.name: Gerard
visible_instructors.job_title: Telecom Expert, Educator, Entrepreneur, Angel Investor

items.headline: Learn How to Build Your Own Smart Home Automation System from scratch without getting confused or wasting money.
objectives_summary: Confidently buy and install various Internet of Things (IoT) devices that will ‘talk to each other’
At the end of this course you will have learnt the core skills of how to install your own smart home system
You'll have your own alarm system that will cost a fraction of purchasing a traditional home security system

items.title: How to Decorate the Feng Shui Way
items.headline: Improve your home and work place by balancing the nine areas of any space to gain more peace, success and better health.
objectives_summary: Organize your living and working space for more comfort.
Draw a Feng Shui map of your space.
Set the appropriate intention for each of the nine areas.

items.title: Roman Blind Making Sewing The Professional Way

visible_instructors.name: Linda
visible_instructors.title: Linda Turner
visible_instructors.job_title: Interior Designer specialising in soft furnishings

items.headline: With handy hints and tricks of the trade this is a must do course if you want to make your own top quality Roman blinds
objectives_summary: Easy to follow videos showing you how to make a Roman Blind from start to finish
Increase your earnings by making & selling top quality Roman blinds
Understand how to assess and measure a window accurately and know the difference between inside and outside recess blinds

items.title: How to make a liquid Soap professionally
items.headline: liquid Soap
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, you will be able to make liquid Soap professionally using 3 levels of quality.
You will now the Characteristics of each material we use in making a liquid soap.
You will now the popular mistakes and problems you may face during the production.

items.title: Ultimate Garden Design Course
items.headline: Learn garden design and all of its basics
objectives_summary: Learn about client’s brief
Learn how to do the site survey
Learn how to draw, ink and colour the conceptual plan to scale and prepare for presentation

items.title: 7 Days to Master Feng Shui
items.headline: Creating mindfulness for the home, positively changing energy in virtually any space.
objectives_summary: Utilizing and trusting instincts
Learn various forms of Feng Shui diagnostics
Learn Feng Shui solutions

items.title: Brutally honest course on science & business of Hydroponics.
items.headline: THE GROUNDBREAKING VIDEO COURSE THAT REVEALS HOW TO SETUP YOUR HYDROPONIC FARM.
objectives_summary: You will learn principles of hydroponics.
Grow one of the world's most profitable legal cash crops - using shelves and simple equipment.
Start growing superfoods on a budget - for profit or pleasure.

items.title: Gardening Know How: Attracting Birds and Butterflies
items.headline: Create a beautiful bird and butterfly filled garden, yard, or even balcony via simple, practical, and fun DIY projects!
objectives_summary: Create a backyard that will attract birds, butterflies, and other beneficial animals.
Understand the important relationships between plants and animals, and how this relationship can help you create a thriving backyard full of birds, butterflies, and other beneficial animals.
Identify exactly which flowers, trees, shrubs, and other plants will attract and support birds and butterflies.

items.title: Outdoor Gardening
items.headline: Online bootcamp for beginner gardeners.
objectives_summary: Everything About Outdoor Gardening

items.title: Beekeeping: A first course for Aspiring Beekeepers
items.headline: Designed specifically for the non-beekeeper.  Explore beekeeping as a new, exciting and rewarding lifetime activity.
objectives_summary: The many wonderful benefits of bees and bee keeping and why you should consider becoming a beekeeper
The requirements needed to become a beekeeper
The challenges involved in starting any new activity or hobby and how to overcome them

items.title: Woodworking: Finishing Essentials

visible_instructors.title: George Vondriska
visible_instructors.name: George
visible_instructors.job_title: Managing Editor & Instructor of Woodworkers Guild of America

items.headline: This detailed course will cover everything you need to feel confident when finishing your next project.
objectives_summary: This woodworking course will provide preparation and application tips to achieve the best finish.
Help you understand what finish is best for your projects.
Easy to use finishing techniques will products that are readily available.

items.title: Pruning Trees and Shrubs - Everything you need to know
items.headline: Prune any woody plant in your garden, using our simple 3-step system. Proper pruning for healthy plants & more flowers
objectives_summary: This course will provide full details for pruning trees and shrubs, everything from the basics up to advanced topics.
A hands on course that shows you exactly what to do.
Selecting the right pruning tools.

items.title: How to Create a Sucessful Planting Scheme
items.headline: Garden Design
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to create a planting plan using recognised design methods.
The planting plan can be applied to any garden space once the method is learned.
